item.title: Beocord 5000 (4715/4716): Replacing the Belts
item.description: I obtained replacement belts for my Beocord 5000 from ‘Dillen’ on Beoworld.org, allowing me to resume my work on the unit. Replacing the belts is a straightforward process, but it demands patience because the drive mechanism requires significant disassembly. The service manual only explains how to access the top belts, not the bottom ones. However, a Beoworld.org thread provided valuable insights and cautions, including a story about a broken PCB #3 (“Electronic Switch”) resulting from improper belt installation.
